title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly identifying the minimum is not in interior of domain

h' is positive, then negative, so minimum is at an endpoint

1 point is earned for correctly stating h ( − 6 ) = 0

h(−6)= ∫ 0 0 f(t)dt=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaiaacI cacqGHsislcaaI2aGaaiykaiabg2da9maapedabaGaamOzaiaacIca caWG0bGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaGimaaWcbaGaaGimaa qaaiaaicdaa0Gaey4kIipaaaa@456B@

1 point is earned for correctly stating h(4) is negative

1 point is earned for the correct answer, x = 4

Since the area below the axis is greater than the area above the axis therefore minimum at x = 4

Note: Domain [0,5], max 1/4, 1 - 0 - 0 - 0

No interior critical point in student's domain, max 1/4, 0 - 0 - 0 - 1
